    @allure.title("Create Protocol and select based on policy for Nitrosamine residue verification")
    @allure.description("This test case tests API to Create Protocol based on policy for nitrosamine residue "

    @pytest.mark.create_protocol_nitrosamine_residue_verification_based_on_policy_sqm_ug
    def test_create_protocol_nitrosamine_residue_verification_based_on_policy_sqm_ug(self):
        nitrosamine_data = {}
        nitrosamine_data.update(self.DEFAULT_SURFACE_AREA_SQM)
        unit = self.update_default_unit.test_get_default_unit(nitrosamine_data)["response"]
        unit = json.loads(unit)["default_units"]["unit"]
    
        if unit != "sqm":
            self.update_default_unit.test_update_default_unit(nitrosamine_data)
            self.change_assessment.test_start_cleaning_assessment(scenario=True)
            self.change_assessment.test_submit_approve_cleaning_assessment()
    
        columns_prod = ["production_id"]
        productions_list = Excel.read_excel_columns(const.get_master_data(), "config", columns_prod)
        data = {"production": productions_list["production_id"], "description": "Automation Protocol"}
        protocol_detail, data = self.setup_protocol(data)
        self.multi_protocol.PROTOCOL = json.loads(protocol_detail)
        data.update({"protocol_name": None})
        protocol_id = self.multi_protocol.get_protocol_id(data)
        data.update({"protocol_id": protocol_id, "nitrosamine_verification": True})
        data.update({"update_verification_protocol": protocol_verification_payload(data)})
        get_equipment = self.protocol_equipment.get_equipment_protocol(data)["response"]
    
        self.protocol_nitrosamine.PROTOCOL_NITROSAMINE_EQUIPMENT = json.loads(get_equipment)
    
        self.protocol_verification.update_inspection_protocol(data)
    
        direct_equipments_sal = self.protocol_nitrosamine.get_nitrosamine_direct_details_based_on_policy(data)[
            "response"]
        self.protocol_nitrosamine.DIRECT_NITROSAMINE_EQUIPMENT = json.loads(direct_equipments_sal)
    
        direct_equipment = self.protocol_nitrosamine.direct_nitrosamine_update_policy_payload()["equipments"]
    
        data.update({"direct_equipment": direct_equipment, "direct_policy": "policyBased",
                     "columns": ["Nitrosamine ID", "final_sal_ug_sqm"]})
        data.update({"update_nitrosamine_residue_verification_payload": nitrosamine_residue_verification_payload(data)})
    
        self.protocol_nitrosamine.update_nitrosamine_residue_verification_protocol(data)
